attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this government should forget the euro state it wants to be part of, it disgracefully underminds the sacrifice all the men and women who fought during the war for the allies, against a dictatorship. ,they;ve forgotten who voted them in,and who they are supposed to represent

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
